subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: With the uncertainty caused by the N.B.A.’s expiring labor agreement, Carmelo Anthony said he would try to sign an extension with the Nuggets, or his next team if he is traded.
snippet: With the uncertainty caused by the N.B.A.’s expiring labor agreement, Carmelo Anthony said he would try to sign an extension with the Nuggets, or his next team if he is traded.
